data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Töv, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Töv, Mongolia

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Töv, Mongolia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 816 believers in Töv, Mongolia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Töv to agree with you and with one another.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Uzemchin people. 0.7% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Töv do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Töv, Mongolia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Töv, Mongolia has a population of 94,500.

We estimate Töv has 816 people who might know Jesus, 850 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 92,834 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 115 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Töv, Mongolia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Töv
